content: ssiimmppllee ddeeccooyy wwaasspp nneesstt pattern by crochet by emily notes copyright © 2024 you may not copy reproduce alter or publish this pattern you may sell finished products made using this pattern please give credit to crochet by emily when making posts on social media using this pattern follow me on instagram and facebook @crochetbyemilymn and enjoy materials abbreviations weight 4 acrylic yarn r - round caron one pound - lace color mc - magic_ring 3 75mm hook increase - increase fiber fill single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - decrease chain - chain pattern slip_stitch - slip_stitch hive - stitches to be repeated r1 mc 6 6 - stitch count r2 increase x6 12 r3 single_crochet increase x6 18 r4 single_crochet around 18 r5 5sc increase x3 21 r6 single_crochet around 21 r7 6sc increase x3 24 r8 3sc increase x6 30 r9-10 single_crochet around 30 2 rounds r11 4sc increase x6 36 r12-13 single_crochet around 36 2 rounds r14 5sc increase x6 42 r15-16 single_crochet around 42 2 rounds r17 6sc increase x6 48 r18-20 single_crochet around 48 3 rounds r21 7sc increase x6 54 r22-24 single_crochet around 54 3 rounds r25 8sc increase x6 60 r26-27 single_crochet around 60 2 rounds r28 9sc increase x6 66 r29-30 single_crochet around 66 2 rounds ©2024 crochet by emily - all rights reserved r31 10sc increase x6 72 r32-33 single_crochet around 72 2 rounds r34 10sc decrease x6 66 r35 9sc decrease x6 60 r36 8sc decrease x6 54 r37 7sc decrease x6 48 r38 6sc decrease x6 42 r39 5sc decrease x6 36 r40 4sc decrease x6 30 begin adding stuffing continue stuffing as you go r41 3sc decrease x6 24 r42 2sc decrease x6 18 r43 single_crochet decrease x6 12 r44 decrease around 6 finish stuffing fasten_off sew closed and weave in ends hanger attach yarn to top center of hive chain 10 slip_stitch in same stitch of hive fasten_off and weave in ends congrats you ve finished your wasp nest please be sure to follow me on instagram and facebook @crochetbyemilymn ©2024 crochet by emily -
